ValidationRule.description: if no rate card is available, check the 'no rate card request' checkbox field to confirm
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
$Setup.byPass__c.ByPass_Validation__c = FALSE,
$Profile.Name = "Standard Ads User Profile",
RecordType.DeveloperName = $Label.OPP_RECORDTYPEDEVNAME_PMP,
OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Verbal Commitment'), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Contract Processing and Review'), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closed Won') ),
Rate_Card_Available__c = FALSE,
No_Rate_Card_Exception__c = FALSE
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If no rate card exception is associated with this opportunity, check 'no rate card exception' to confirm
